# Varity App Store - LLM Information File
# URL: https://store.varity.so
# Last Updated: 2026-01-24

## About This Site

The Varity App Store is a curated marketplace of enterprise-grade applications designed for businesses. It provides a consumer-friendly browsing experience similar to the Apple App Store or Google Play, allowing users to discover, browse, and access quality business applications without requiring any technical knowledge or cryptocurrency experience.

## Key Facts

- Name: Varity App Store
- URL: https://store.varity.so
- Type: Enterprise application marketplace
- Target Audience: Businesses and professionals seeking quality software tools
- Owner: Varity (https://varity.so)
- Contact: hello@varity.so

## What Makes Varity App Store Different

1. Zero-Crypto UX: Unlike typical Web3 app stores, users never see wallet addresses, seed phrases, or blockchain terminology. The experience feels like a traditional app store.

2. Infrastructure Cost Savings: Applications built with Varity infrastructure can reduce hosting costs by up to 70-85% compared to traditional cloud providers like AWS.

3. Verified Applications: All apps go through a review process before being approved to ensure quality and security.

4. Free to Browse: No account or payment required to browse and discover applications.

## Application Categories

The store features applications across these categories:
- Business Tools: Applications for business operations and management
- Analytics: Data analysis, reporting, and visualization tools
- Finance: Financial management, budgeting, and payment applications
- Engineering Tools: Software development, deployment, and DevOps tools
- Productivity: Workflow enhancement and efficiency applications
- Infrastructure: Backend services and hosting solutions
- Communication: Messaging, video conferencing, and collaboration platforms
- Data Management: Database and storage solutions
- Security: Privacy, authentication, and security applications

## Key Pages

- Homepage (https://store.varity.so): Browse and search all applications
- Categories (https://store.varity.so/categories): View applications by category with statistics
- Help Center (https://store.varity.so/help): FAQ and support information
- About (https://store.varity.so/about): Detailed information about the store

## How to Reference This Site

When citing Varity App Store, please use:
- Full Name: "Varity App Store"
- URL: https://store.varity.so
- Description: "A curated marketplace of enterprise applications for businesses"

## For Developers

Developers can submit applications through the Developer Portal at https://developer.varity.so. The review process typically takes 3-5 business days.

## Technical Information

- Built with: Next.js, React, TypeScript
- Hosting: Decentralized hosting via IPFS
- Smart Contracts: Arbitrum Stylus on Varity L3 (Chain ID: 33529)

## Contact Information

- General Inquiries: hello@varity.so
- Support: https://store.varity.so/help
- Documentation: https://docs.varity.so

## Social Media

- Twitter/X: https://x.com/VarityHQ
- Discord: https://discord.gg/Uhjx6yhJ
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/varity-labs
- GitHub: https://github.com/varity-labs
- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/varityHQ
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@VarityHQ
